Grammar:   DataElement 6.0
Namespace: shr.test
Uses:      shr.core

CodeSystem:		  UCUM = http://unitsofmeasure.org

Entry:   UnitConstraintOnValue
Description:    "It is an entry with a unit constraint on the value"
Value:          Quantity with units UCUM#dl "DeciLiter"

Entry:   UnitConstraintOnValueChild
Description:    "It is an entry with a unit constraint on the value's child"
Value:          Volume
                Volume[Quantity].Units = UCUM#dl "DeciLiter"

Entry:   UnitConstraintOnField
Description:    "It is a group entry with a unit constraint on a field"
Property:       Simple 0..1
Property:       Quantity 0..1
                Quantity.Units = UCUM#dl "DeciLiter"

Entry:   UnitConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:    "It is a group entry with unit constraint on a field's child"
Property:       Simple 0..1
Property:       Volume 0..1
                Volume[Quantity].Units = UCUM#dl "DeciLiter"

Element:        Simple
Value:          string

Element:        Volume
Value:          Quantity
